item.title: New Pixel 10 Pro Leak Reveals Google’s Critical Upgrades
item.description: Google’s upcoming Pixel 10 Pro and the rest of the Pixel 10 family will offer significant changes to the hardware when launched in the fall.

item.title: Google’s Gmail Upgrade—Do Not Lose Your Email Account
item.description: New AI attacks mean you must act before it’s too late—here’s what you do.

item.title: You Should Watch Destiny 2’s Amazing New Cutscene, Even If You’ve Left
item.description: Destiny 2 never fails to perplex me in terms of its storytelling decisions, and now it's dropped one of its best cutscenes ever at a random time.

item.title: TV’s Best Comedy Is On Tonight, Still With A 100% Critic Score
item.description: The best new show to hit TV in a while has arrived with perfect scores from critics, but it may not be for everyone, given its subject matter.

item.title: Samsung’s Android 15 Upgrade—Check Your Settings Now
item.description: This option should be enabled before you upgrade—here’s why.
